actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Security Technologies

official_title: To require a report and assessment regarding Department of Homeland Security responses to terrorist threats to Federal elections, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Security for the Administration of Federal Election from Terrorists Intervention Act of 2017 or the SAFETI Act

This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to submit to the Government Accountability Office (GAO) and Congress a report on actions taken by DHS relating to terrorist threats to the integrity of the 2016 federal elections. The GAO shall conduct an assessment of the effectiveness of such actions and include recommendations for improvements.
